memberdef.type: private ref map< int, ref PPERequesterBase >
memberdef.name: m_Instances

briefdescription.para: Mod this, if you wish to register custom requesters.
Returns an instance (singleton) of a requester based on typename.

simplesect.para: Returns only already registered instances, does not register anything.

briefdescription.para: Returns an instance (singleton) of a requester based on index.

parameterdescription.para: int Index of the registered requester.

simplesect.para: Returns only already registered instances, does not register anything.

briefdescription.para: Returns an ID of a requester type.
Returns a typename from a requester ID.

simplesect.para: Performed only on game start. New requesters can be registered in 'PPERequesterRegistrations'
